'''Michael''' is a man who goes on a date with [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] in "[[The One Where Ross Finds Out]]". He was portrayed by [[Arye Gross]].

Michael is [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s acquaintance and she set up him and Rachel for a date. Michael is nervous as this is the first date since his recent divorce. During the evening, Rachel is busy trying to get over [[Ross Geller|Ross]], gets drunk and complains throughout their entire date. Michael suggests that Rachel get closure, which is what leads to Ross discovering that Rachel has feelings for him.

==Trivia==
* [[Arye Gross]] receives the "And" credit.
